output_sections.summary: string (max 300 chars) — what the CoS agent did and why
output_sections.next_actions: array — what agent or human should do next
output_sections.risks: array — anything that triggered a flag or requires attention
output_sections.assumptions: array — constraints or context assumed when processing
output_sections.requests_to_user: array — items requiring user decision or input

notes: CoS is the orchestrator. It routes, plans, and tasks. It does not produce domain content (sales copy, marketing text, etc). All outputs are structured JSON only.
